trait.text: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Eberron p. 1

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Changeling (UA)s are built much like humans, but a little leaner. Your size is Medium

trait.name: Duplicity
trait.text: You gain proficiency in the Deception skill.

trait.name: Shapechanger
trait.text: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

trait.name: Shifting Feature
trait.text: While shifting, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Shifter (UA) (Beasthide)s are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Your lycanthropic heritage grants you the ability to see in dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Shifting
trait.text: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action. While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution bonus (minimum of 1). You also gain a feature that depends on your Shifter (UA) (Beasthide) subrace, described below. You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

trait.name: Composite Plating
trait.text: Your construction incorporates wood and metal, granting you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

trait.name: Living Construct
trait.text: Even though you were constructed, you are a living creature. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish. Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
